name: Greed and feed
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 46 Jam

Take control of a raccoon hungry for treasure!
The treasure is under a huge boar, you need to get rid of the boar first.

This is your plan:
1) Plant the seed for a CARNIVORE flower.
2) FEED the flower with small boars.
3) Once flower is FULLY GROWN it will eat the huge boar.
4) Be first to grab the TREASURE!

Game supports 1-4 players.
XInput are required for multiplayer.
Player one can use keyboard optionally.

Join: Start or Enter
Move: Dpad, Left stick or Arrow keys
Jump: A or Space
Push: B or Left Ctrl

Quit: Escape
Restart: R
